relatedBlades.title: Easy-to-use performance and security tools your website needs
relatedBlades.copy: Delight customers and boost revenue with Cloudflare Business. Keep your business growing strong with affordable and reliable DNS, CDN, DDoS protection, and more.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: 90% of the internet-connected world is within 0.05 seconds of a Cloudflare server.

relatedBlades.copy:
Is Cloudflare Business for everyone?

Cloudflare Business is the right solution for you if you need the following:

features.title: Built-in compliance
features.description: PCI, SOC 2 Type II and SOC 3 compliance

relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare powers millions of Internet properties

Here are some you might recognize

Benefits for both business owners and customers

A closer look at how Cloudflare Business can help you and your customers

features.title: Ultra-fast content delivery
features.description: Our global CDN delivers content from our edge network to reach your customers faster than ever.

features.title: Minimal load times
features.description: For businesses that rely on web experiences, speed means happy customers and more revenue.

features.title: No-code performance tools
features.description: No coders? No problem. Turn on extra features at the click of a button.

features.title: Around-the-clock DDoS protection
features.description: Enjoy peace of mind thanks to always-on and always-learning DDoS mitigation and attack alerts.

features.title: Enhanced cyber security
features.description: Our cloud based web application firewall (WAF) automatically detects and prevents cyber attacks.

features.title: Reliable bot management
features.description: Allow our machine learning to fingerprint and analyze bot behavior and filter out bad bots.

relatedBlades.copy:
Ultra-fast DNS and CDN help you reach customers faster than ever

For businesses that rely on web experiences, speed means happy customers and more revenue

- With 250+ data centers around the world, Cloudflare CDN can serve cached content from whichever server is closest to your customers. - Cloudflare DNS is one of the world's fastest with a worldwide propagation of less than 5s and it's used as DNS server provider for more websites than any other provider (source: w3techs.com). - No-code tools increase site speed even further by reducing image file sizes and minifying HTML, CSS, and JavaScript at the click of a button. [__Sign up for Cloudflare Business today >__](https://dash.cloudflare.com/sign-up?to=/:account/:zone/billing/checkout&add=cf_biz)

relatedBlades.quote: "The performance improvement from Cloudflare is a huge benefit for our clients. If you shave 60 ms off your request on a retail site, that equals sales, conversions, and engagement. It's fantastic."

relatedBlades.copy:
Enhanced security builds resilience and ensures business continuity

With Cloudflare Business you protect your internet properties and customers from cyber attacks

- Cloudflare Business gives you access to supplemental protection with tools like Secure Shell protocol (SSH) and Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). - Control the deployment of standard firewall rulesets and to define your own custom firewall rules. - Gain access to in-depth bot analytics to view traffic and filter traffic by IP address or user agent to pinpoint and stop attackers. [__Sign up for Cloudflare Business today >__](https://dash.cloudflare.com/sign-up?to=/:account/:zone/billing/checkout&add=cf_biz)

Getting started is easy

It only takes 5 minutes and we provide you with step-by-step instructions once you sign up

relatedBlades.bladeName: PAYGO - Business Plan - LP - Page Blade-Accordion_Headline
relatedBlades.title: Frequently asked questions

accordionElements.title: Can I keep my current DNS provider and still use the other features of the Business plan?

content.value: Absolutely! Cloudflare Business allows you to still leverage our network with a partial (CNAME) setup while maintaining your current DNS provider. All other tools included in the plan are available to you to use without restrictions.

accordionElements.title: Cloudflare offers free CDN and DNS. Why should I pay for a Business plan?

content.value: With Cloudflare Business you have access to the same great DNS, CDN and DDoS protection tools as on our Free and Pro plans, but you enjoy increased control over how you can use these tools. For example, with Cloudflare Business, you have more "page rules" available to dictate how the CDN caches your content, including what gets cached and for how long at the individual page level.

accordionElements.title: I'm already a Cloudflare customer. How do I enable the Business plan?

content.value: Start by logging into the
Cloudflare dashboard
Select the site you wish to upgrade;
Then on the right side of the Overview page locate the "Active Subscriptions" section, and next to your current plan click the "Change" button;
Select the Business plan and click "Continue". You're all set!
Note: If you have not had a paid plan before you will be asked to enter your credit card and billing information prior to completing your upgrade to the Business plan.

accordionElements.title: What does the Business plan provide that I can't get on the cheaper plans?

content.value: Guaranteed uptime. 100% uptime service level agreement (SLA)
Built-in compliance. Meet PCI compliance simply by enabling the Cloudflare WAF and Modern TLS Only mode. Also includes SOC 2 Type II compliance and SOC 3 compliance.
Prioritized support. Get professional support when you need it with prioritized chat and email support. Average email response time of less than 2 hours for urgent issues.

accordionElements.title: Is SSL / TLS included in the Business plan?

content.value: Yes! You'll get "the lock" to show visitors your website is trustworthy and SEO benefits from Cloudflare's universal SSL. By default, Cloudflare issues and renews free, unshared, publicly trusted SSL certificates for your domain. Plus, the Business plan allows you to bring your own SSL certificates and purchase and manage more certificates with our Advanced Certificate Manager.

relatedBlades.title: Don't risk your site security and performance
